G

Game - Class in com.matthew0x40.yahtzee.game
This "Game" class provides an interface for the entire Yahtzee to abstract away most of the logic in order to focus on the user interface in classes that extend this class.
Game(Settings, List<String>) - Constructor for class com.matthew0x40.yahtzee.game.Game
Construct a Game object from a given settings and set of players
